body_html:
Have you had any luck solving this problem on your own @bixiongxu? I would try the following..

  1. Try tensorflow 0.10rc1 or the nightly build since 0.8 is now quite old.
  2. If that doesn't work try to simplify your example to the simplest test that reproduces the behavior. Include the code and exact instructions on how to reproduce it.

We cannot guarantee that we will have time to look into it, but others in the community definitely would have a chance of helping you then too. However, without a reproducible test case, we will close the issue as "cannot reproduce."

body:
Have you had any luck solving this problem on your own @bixiongxu? I would try the following..
1. Try tensorflow 0.10rc1 or the nightly build since 0.8 is now quite old.
2.  If that doesn't work try to simplify your example to the simplest test that reproduces the behavior. Include the code and exact instructions on how to reproduce it.

We cannot guarantee that we will have time to look into it, but others in the community definitely would have a chance of helping you then too. However, without a reproducible test case, we will close the issue as "cannot reproduce."
